attributes.action: Deselect all MPs with dodgy expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how can mps claim £400 for food and expect the unemployed to live on £63.40 a week?

rejection.details: MPs' salaries and expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
